Description: Clean and fresh one PLUS bedroom unit in a wonderful Malden location close to Medford. This first floor unit has just been painted and the hardwood flooring has been refinished. It features a spacious bedroom and closet along with a bonus room that can be used as a guest room or office. The sizable kitchen offers gas cooking, a dishwasher, and lots of cabinet space. Some storage space may be available and there is laundry in the basement that can be used by the tenant. This is an ideal location for both public transportation or commuting to the city by car. Unit is ready for occupancy for October 1st! Schedule a showing today.
